resources.string: 如何使用 Lichess 比賽直播
新的一局會有跟上一局相同的成員與貢獻者

string.name: completedHelp
string.comment: This string used to say "Lichess detects round completion based on the source games. Use this toggle if there is no source." but has since been streamlined along with the rest of the user interface. Please update translations as needed.

resources.string: Lichess 偵測棋局的結束，但有可能會偵測錯誤。請在這自行設定。

string.name: fullDescription
string.comment: This text used to say "Full event description". It can be changed to "tournament" since all broadcast events are tournaments.

string.name: fullDescriptionHelp
string.comment:
This text used to start with "Optional long description of the broadcast.". The word should be changed to "tournament" since all broadcast events are tournaments, and it is a more user-friendly term.
%1$s says "Markdown" (a proper noun) and gives a link to a description of Markdown. %2$s is the character limit (e.g. 160)

resources.string: 直播內容的詳細描述 。可以利用 %1$s。字數限於%2$s個字。
Lichess 將以該網址更新PGN數據，網址必須公開
最多 64 個以空格分開的 Lichess 棋局序號。

string.name: startDateTimeZone
string.comment:
The date the real-life tournament starts, in the location it will take place.
%s is the date.

resources.string: 當地時區的錦標賽起始日期：%s
可選，如果知道比賽開始時間

string.name: definitivelyDeleteRound
string.comment:
Refers to live tournaments being broadcast on Lichess (https://lichess.org/broadcast).
Description (also translateable): Delete all games of this round. The source will need to be active in order to re-create them.
This string has been amended since its initial publication; it didn't say "all its games" at the time.

resources.string: 刪除這局以及其所有棋局
刪除所有此輪的棋局。直播來源必須是開啟的以成功重新建立棋局。
刪除錦標賽以及所有棋局
根據比賽結果顯示玩家分數
取代玩家名字、評級、以及頭銜（選填）
請求之間的時間間隔，最少 2 秒，最多 60 秒。預設為依照觀看人數決定。（選填）
